nodes.text: The Grappler was an organic ship created by the living planet Zonama Sekot during the Battle of Yuuzhan'tar as part of the "Fight Without Fighting" plan against the Yuuzhan Vong.

They resembled a maidenfly insect with green wings and red carapaces. They also had a grasping hand and dovin basal-like gravity projectors to bring down Galactic Alliance fighters and Yuuzhan Vong Alpha Red-infected coralskippers.
